name: Wrestledunk Sports
description:
Wrestledunk your friends!

4 super competitive (or cooperative) sports


  • Master the minimalist-fighting game style Wrestling!
  • Spike on your opponents in the arcade-sport type Volleyball!
  • Respectfully participate in extremely realistic swordfighting with Fencing!
  • Or go fast, with the intergalactic hyper pong of Smashball!

Play competitively, or as a team against others! The demo has wrestling and volleyball to try!

High performance online and local multiplayer


Fully custom networking system for seamless, local-feeling online play!
It's a fully deterministic, rollback netcode system, built from the socket up especially for Wrestledunk. Fighting game precision, responsive speed, and inputs that always feel local!
It also supports local/couch play too, or a mix of both!

Loads of arenas and modes


Unlock new arenas and modes for each sport, like netless volleyball, or falling swords for fencing!

Easy to pick up!


All sports were carefully designed to be easy to pick up, even for people who don't usually play many games, but all of them have lots of room in the skill ceiling to get really good, so you can dunk on your enemies (or your friends!).

Easy to pick up, impossible to master, all the Wrestledunk sports are fast, fun, and super competitive. Local and online multiplayer, loads of maps, one champion. Get your Wrestledunk on!
